component.name: Hierarchical Clustering
component.author: geWorkbench Development Team
component.description: Hierarchical clustering results in grouping the most similar gene expression profiles together in a tree-like fashion, where the leaves closest to each other along a path are most similar. geWorkbench implements an agglomorative (bottom up) clustering, which begins at the leaves of the tree. The traditional representation of the resulting tree-like hierarchy is called a dendrogram.
